          <title>
            <string language="en">The elements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Elemente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les éléments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os elementos</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows some elements. These are substances that cannot be split into simpler substances.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einige Elemente. Diese
sind Substanzen, die nicht in einfachere Substanzen aufgespaltet 
werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre quelques éléments. 
Ce sont des substances qui ne peuvent pas être coupées en 
substances plus simples.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra alguns elementos. 
Estas são as substâncias que não podem ser rachadas em umas 
substâncias mais simples.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra alcuni elementi. 
Queste sono sostanze che non possono essere divise in sostanze 
più semplici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μερικά στοιχεία. 
Αυτές είναι ουσίες που δεν μπορούν να χωριστούν στις 
απλούστερες ουσίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra algunos elementos. 
Éstas son las sustancias que no se pueden partir en sustancias 
más simples.</string>
